modName: Maid Outfits by zzjay and GraceDarkling
summary:
A set of fine dresses
23 colours.
based on barkeeper mesh.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][color=#f1c232]Â [/color]
[color=#90ee90]Description[/color][/size][/center][center]----------------[/center]
[center]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/v8FAhoJ.jpg[/img]

This mod adds a set of 23 fine dresses based on the barkeeper outfit mesh,with proper tweaks.The mesh is for unpvanillacalyps,but it works fine even with cbbeothers.

I always tought Skyrim was missing a set of nobledress,like those that were in Oblivion,and i've been looking for somethinglike this for ages.
When i found out the mod opulent outfits,i got theis idea,and it turned out surprisingly good,thanks to the awesome normalmap Grace made. <3

The dresses can be bought at Radiant Raiment in solitude,or in a chest in QAsmoke.
you can also spawn the "maid outfit chest" with the command player.placeatme xxx 1[/center]


[center][color=lightgreen][size=3]REQUIRED MODS[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/center]
[center]
skyrim.esm
Update.esm
1.8 or higher.[/center]

[center][color=lightgreen][size=3]Location[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/center]
[center]Radiant Raiment in Solitude.[/center]

[center][color=lightgreen][size=3]Mods Used[/size][/color][/center][center]----------------[/center]

[center]ENB:[/center]
[center][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24828][img]http://i.imgur.com/OJOuV.jpg[/img][/url][/center]

[center]SKIN:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20483]Women of Skyrim Normalmaps[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23595]XCE unpcbbe[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/1000022560]Specular Map by Xenius[/url][/center]

thanks to yyna for testing.[/center]
